label: Folder 06: CSC Memorandum 21
description: Memorandum to the patron members and committee members of the Civic Services Committee (May 15, 1946) suggesting they read portions of the "May magazine" [presumably referring to the Carolina Art Association newsletter].

metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: Carolina ART  Association  CIVIC SERVICES COMMITTEE  135 MEETING STREET  Charleston 5, S. C.  There is much to read these days but pease hold this momentariy before it goes in the waste basket. If possible read the whole artice, "We believe" but in particuar the record of the Civic Service Committee, pages 10 and 11.  The fact that we are marking time at the present does not indicate that we have abandoned the owrk of the committee. We have held frequent meetings with individuals and small groups and it is clearly indicated that the community desires us to go ahead with our planning studies. We want your opinions and hope that you will either call or write.  Sincerely yours,  Robert N. S. Whitelaw  Director, Civic Services Committee  May 15, 1946  Sent to patron members and committee members with May magazine MES
